name: Mesmerize: Trace
description:
PLAYSTATION®Eye required. Presented in High-Definition 1080p resolution, Mesmerize™: Trace is a collection of absorbing visual and aural effects that respond to your body movements and sounds. Make photon particles dance and sing in Firefly, create a glowing cityscape with your own two hands in Urban, and go on to explore Twister, Chain Reaction and Flare. There's all this and more in Mesmerize™: Trace, a revolutionary Interactive Art experience.

Mesmerize is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. © 2007 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.
Dolby and the double-D symbol are trademarks of Dolby Laboratories.
